data.title: Road construction map
data.meta_description: City of Winnipeg Roadway Construction Map
data.text:
The roadway construction map provides project information visually by location. Project information is available by location in both map and list format.

More information: Lane closures

How to use the construction map

Capital Projects - Public Works - City of Winnipeg

(Last updated on August 16, 2024 @ 8:00 PM)

Current: Completed:

Disclaimer and Indemnity:

The information on this web site is provided as a public service and should be used for general information purposes only. Although the information provided represents the planned capital work on city infrastructure for the current year, the City of Winnipeg cannot guarantee that it is accurate or current at all times. Although it is rare that projects are not finished within the stated timeframe, the City cannot guarantee that the work will be completed in all cases.

The information on this web site is subject to change without notice.
